mapper.select: select codecontent from codemaster where codeno = #{CodeNo}
select cdcontent from codedetail where codeno = #{CodeNo} and cdselect = #{CdSelect}
mapper.insert: insert into history values ( #{projectNo}, sysdate, #{logContent}, #{CodeNo}, history_seq.nextval, #{userNo} )
mapper.select: select * from history where userno = #{userNo} order by logtime desc
select h.projectno, h.logtime, h.logcontent from history h, member m where rownum <= 7 and m.projectno = h.projectno and m.userno = #{userno} order by h.logtime desc
